title: How does stoicism affect one's life? - Quora

response.answer_text: It hurts like termite do to any timber looks alright from outside but rotten inside but the first to understand is why should one suffer one should open his feelings world is not yet so bad Express yourself feelings lighten your heart if nobody listens speak directly to God he never gets bored or rebukes life is very uncertain short don't let others master you be your own master enjoy
Many people practice it in their life without awareness, keep silent and bear all the sufferings made by the politicians and do not even think about revolution.
